Message.MsgText: XBGS0220=XBGS0220E: Job scheduler MBeans may not be available.
Message.Explanation: Unable to query job scheduler MBeans.
Message.UserResponse: Verify job scheduler set up and configuration steps.

Message.Explanation: Unable to get a database connection through the job scheduler datasource.
Message.UserResponse: Verify that all setup steps have been completed and the database has started.

Message.MsgText: XBGS0110=XBGS0110E: Startup bean service not enabled.
Message.Explanation: The startup bean service has not been enabled on the job scheduler server.
Message.UserResponse: Enable startup bean service at the job scheduler application server panel.

Message.Explanation: Unable to get job scheduler identity from the Bulletin Board.
Message.UserResponse: Verify job scheduler set up and configuration steps.

Message.MsgText: XBGS0100=XBGS0100E: Datasource JNDI Name not configured.
Message.Explanation: The datasource JNDI name for the job scheduler has not been set.
Message.UserResponse: Configure the job scheduler datasource JNDI Name at the configuration panel.
